text:

Emissiestandaard: 4

Maximaal aanhangergewicht geremd: 1000 Kg

Emission standard: 4
Number of cilinders: 4
Topspeed: 180 km/h
Acceleration 0-100 km/h: 12 sec
Vehicle weight: 950 kg
Maximum permissible weight: 1465 kg
Braked trailer load: 1000 kg

Airbag
• Airbag Driver
• Airbag passenger
• Side airbags front
Air conditioning
• Air conditioning passenger
• Manual air conditioning

• Cruise control
• Electric rear windows

• delivery after inspection

Headrests

• Detachable towbar
